name: thunder-shock
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to paralyze the target.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A jolt of electricity crashes down on the target to inflict damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.
